title: Authors and Citation
text: Matt Dray. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Dray M (2022). quartostamp: RStudio Addin Insert Quarto Helpers. R package version 0.0.0.9001.
code: @Manual{,   title = {quartostamp: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers},   author = {Matt Dray},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9001}, }

what: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
title: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
text: R package containing RStudio Addin insert useful little divs classes documents made Quarto. ‘quartostamp’? can physically stamp pre-written type literal quarto document; can digitally stamp pre-written elements qmd file. See : package website full list available functions Quarto website full documentation install package, run following restart RStudio: use: Put cursor Quarto file ’d like insert div class Click ‘RStudio Addins’ dropdown top RStudio IDE Scroll/search ‘QUARTOSTAMP’ click function want

what: quartostamp: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers — quartostamp-package
title: quartostamp: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers — quartostamp-package
text: RStudio Addin help insert ('stamp') useful little code blocks Quarto document.

title: quartostamp: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers — quartostamp-package
text: Maintainer: Matt Dray mwdray@gmail.com

title: Insert Aside — stamp_aside
text: Insert div creates 'aside' Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert 'Caution' Callout Block — stamp_callout_caution
text: Insert callout block type 'caution'.

title: Insert 'Important' Callout Block — stamp_callout_important
text: Insert callout block type 'important'.

title: Insert 'Note' Callout Block — stamp_callout_note
text: Insert callout block type 'note'.

title: Insert 'Tip' Callout Block — stamp_callout_tip
text: Insert callout block type 'tip'.

title: Insert 'Warning' Callout Block — stamp_callout_warning
text: Insert callout block type 'warning'.

title: Insert Column Layout — stamp_columns
text: Insert div horizontal two-column layout percentage widths Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Slide Divider — stamp_divider
text: Insert slide divider Revealjs presentation (slides without titles).

title: Insert Custom Footer — stamp_footer
text: Insert custom footer div Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Footnote — stamp_footnote
text: Insert footnote marker Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Incremental List — stamp_incremental
text: Insert list-containing div Revealjs presentation slide revealed incrementally.

title: Insert Non-Incremental List — stamp_nonincremental
text: Insert list-containing div Revealjs presentation slide revealed incrementally  (overrides global incremental reveal).

title: Insert Speaker Notes — stamp_notes
text: Insert speaker notes div Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Pause — stamp_pause
text: Insert pause marker Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Scrollable Content — stamp_scrollable
text: Insert class allows content scrolled slide small hold .

title: Insert Smaller Font — stamp_smaller
text: Insert class makes font smaller Revealjs presentation slide. (place line slide title).

title: Insert Tabset — stamp_tabset
text: Insert panel tabset div Revealjs presentation slide.

title: quartostamp 0.0.0.9001
text: Added callout blocks stamp_callout_*() (#1, suggested @IndrajeetPatil).

title: quartostamp 0.0.0.9000
text: Set package license, news, readme. Added RStudio Addins infrastructure (inst/rstudio/addins.dcf). Added first stamp_() functions.
